titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University Vice Provost and University Librarian search records (Sara Lowman), 2007 UA 291
titlestmt.author: Lynda Crist

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 13:09:33 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Rice University Vice Provost and University Librarian search records (Sara Lowman)
did.abstract: These records reflect the business of the Vice Provist and University Librarian search committee of 2007, whose efforts resulted in the hiring of Sara Lowman.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Vice Provost and University Librarian search committee consisted of Rice University staff and faculty, with the assistance of the Auerbach Associates search firm.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These records reflect the business of the Vice Provist and University Librarian search committee of 2007, whose efforts resulted in the hiring of Sara Lowman.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is restricted. Please contact woodson@rice.edu for help in requesting permission from the University Librarian to view this material.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transfered from the search committee in 2008.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University Vice Provost and University Librarian search records (Sara Lowman), 2007, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from this material must be facilitated through the Woodson Research Center.

did.unittitle: Search committee members, candidate itineraries, menus, email messages, position qualification descriptions
